column2:
"Heh, the more I watch you, the blander you get.
There's no zing to the way you fight! No whiff
of death to it!"
"And that's fun to you? That's satisfying?"

"It's hollow! Empty! There's no danger, no little
reaper sitting on your shoulder, whispering in
your ear#0,""Soon. Real soon.""

"We're animals. This is a race for survival, and
nature doesn't give a D-arker's ass for your
humanity and your mercy."

"It's about how high in this big, churning spiral
of death you can claw your way up. That's what
determines your worth. That's why we're here!"

"But these sheep refuse to understand that.
They're all too scared or too freaking polite
to say it but me!"
"Well, listen up, <%me>."

"We were built to kill. It's what we are, and we've
got no use, no worth past that!"

"And at the end of all that killing, we finally get
our chance to die. That's the big prize waiting
for you, me, and everybody else!"

"So you'd better get on real friendly terms with
death. Enjoy it! Otherwise there isn't a damn
thing in this broke-ass universe to enjoy."

"I'm slightly envious. It's rare that Guntram
opens up to anyone to quite that extent."

"In fact, I've never seen him speak so frankly
to anyone but you... and that includes myself."
"I bid you good day."

"よォ、<%me>
見れば見るほど無難な戦い方だなァ！
死の気配がこれっぽっちもねェ！"

"そんなんで楽しいのか？
満たされるのか？　なァ、どうなんだ？"

"足りねェんだよ、圧倒的に！
危機感ってヤツがな、全然足りねェ！
ひりつくような死の予感がな！"

"オレたちがやってるのは生存競争だぜ？
殺し殺されの無慈悲な闘いだ。
そしてそこにこそ、充足がある！"

"むせ返るような殺意が渦巻く中にこそ
オレたちの存在価値があるんだよ！"

"それを、誰も彼も
ちっともわかっちゃいねェ！
認めようとしやがらねェ！"

"忘れるなよ
<%me>"

"オレたちは
殺し殺されるためだけの存在！
それ以外の価値はねェ！"

"わからねェか？
死ぬために戦っているんだよ
オレも、オマエも、誰も彼もな！"

"だからこそ死を愉しめよ！
じゃなきゃあ、こんなクソみたいな世界
なーんも楽しくないぜ？"

"……少し、うらやましいですね。
ゲッテムハルト様が、あれだけ感情を
あらわにするのは、めったにありません。"

"私の知る限りでは、貴方様にだけ……
そう、私にだって、あんなには……"
"……失礼します。"
